resources.string: With Bloc, instructions are optional. Our customizable modular furniture empowers individuals to break the mold of traditional design and redefine what it means to start over.

Company Description: At Bloc we focus on giving our customers a creative alternative to modern day furniture. We offer large building blocks that can be used to make customizable modular furniture. Customers are given the option to buy three different sized packages. Our consumers are encouraged to exercise their creative ability by constantly constructing and modifying their designs. Bloc exhibits social responsibility through our partnership with Habitat for Humanity.
